mapper.select: select f.userId as "targetUserId", feedId, nickname, profileImageUri, ( select count(*) from hearts where feedId = f.feedId ) as "heartCount", ( select count(*) from comments where feedId = f.feedId ) as "commentCount", content, registrationDate, IF(f.userId = #{userId},true,false) as "myFeed" from feeds f join users u on f.userId = u.userId where feedId = #{feedId}
select nickname, profileImageUri, content, registrationDate from comments c join users u on u.userId = c.userId where feedId = #{feedId};
mapper.insert: insert into comments(feedId, userId, content) values(#{feedId},#{userId},#{content});
